#Background
**Language family**: Indo-European / Italic / Romance / Western / Gallo-Romance / Occitano-Romance / Catalan / Central Catalan dialect

#Phonology

##Consonants
###Consonants by place
Bilabial: /p/, /b/, /m/ 
Labiodental: /f/, /v/
Alveolar: /t/, /d/, /s/, /z/, /t͡s/, /d͡z/, /n/, /l/, /r/, /ɾ/
Palatal: /c/, /ɟ/, /ʃ/, /ʒ/, /tʃ/, /dʒ/, /ɲ/, /ʎ/, /j/
Velar: /k/, /g/, /ŋ/, /w/

###Consonants by manner
Stop: /p/, /b/, /t/, /d/, /c/, /ɟ/, /k/, /g/
Affricate: /t͡s/, /d͡z/, /tʃ/, /dʒ/
Fricative: /f/, /v/, /s/, /z/, /ʃ/, /ʒ/
Approximant: /j/, /w/, /l/, /ʎ/
Tap: /ɾ/
Trill: /r/

##Vowels
/a/, /ɛ/, /e/, /i/, /ɔ/, /o/, /u/

#Alphabet
A; a; /a/ (stressed) or /ə/ (unstressed)
À; à; /a/ 
B; b; /b/
C; c; /k/
Ç; ç; /s/
D; d; /d/
E; e; /e/ or /ɛ/ (stressed) or /ə/ (unstressed)
È; è; /ɛ/
É; é; /e/
F; f; /f/
G; g; /g/ or /ʒ/
H; h; /h/ (only in loan words)
I; i; /i/
Í; í; /i/
Ï; ï; /i/ 
J; j; /dʒ/ or /ʒ/
L; l; /l/
L·L;ŀl; /lː/
M; m; /m/
N; n; /n/
O; o; /ɔ/ or /o/(stressed) or /u/(unstressed)
Ò; ò; /ɔ/
Ó; ó; /o/
P; p; /p/
Q; q; /k/
R; r; /r/ or /ɾ/
S; s; /s/
T; t; /t/
U; u; /u/
Ú; ú; /u/
Ü; ü; /u/
V; v; /v/ in Valencian, /b/ in Central Catalan
W; w; /w/ (only used in loan words)
X; x; /ʃ/
Y; y; /j/ (only in loan words)
Z; z; /z/

#Rules
/g/ --> [tʃ] / i_
/l/ --> [ʎ] / l_
/n/ --> [ɲ] / _ /j/

##Lenition

###Spirantization
/k/ --> [s] / _V[+front +tense]
/g/ --> [ʒ]/ _V[+front +tense]

###Deletion
C[+obstruent α place] --> ∅ / C[α place]_#
/r/ --> ? / _#
